    • Method Detail

      • getHerdFilters

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getHerdFilters(int herdID,
                                                                int populationID,
                                                                java.lang.String instructorID)
        Get filters created by an instructor to a selected population and herd Filters is a list of string herd attributes that are not visible. This is intended to be used to filter those columns that an instructor wants to hide for a herd's owner (usually the student assigned to this herd)
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the selected population
        instructorID: - Instructor (owner) of the selected population return the list of herd's attribute that have to be hidden

      • existHerdFilters

        public static boolean existHerdFilters(int herdID,
                                       int populationID,
                                       java.lang.String instructorID)
        It checks if a herd has assigned filters
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the selected population
        instructorID: - Instructor (owner) of the selected population
        Returns:
        true, if such a filters exist, otherwise false

      • saveHerdFilters

        public static void saveHerdFilters(int herdID,
                                   int populationID,
                                   java.lang.String instructorID,
                                   java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> filters)
        Save a list of filters created for a chosen herd
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of the chosen herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Instructor (owner) of the herd's population
        filters: - List of hidden string attributes

      • deleteHerdFilters

        public static boolean deleteHerdFilters(int herdID)
        Delete all filters assigned to a chosen herd's identifier. Note: This delete operation is independent of any instructor or population
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of chosen herd
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed, otherwise false.

      • removeHerdFilters

        public static boolean removeHerdFilters(int populationID)
        Delete filters created for all herds of a chosen population.
        Parameters:
        populationID: - Identifier of the chosen population
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed, otherwise false.

      • deleteHerdFilters

        public static boolean deleteHerdFilters(int herdID,
                                        int populationID)
        Delete filters created for a chosen herd of a chosen population.
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of a chosen herd.
        populationID: - Identifier of the chosen population
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed, otherwise false.

      • removeHerdFilters

        public static boolean removeHerdFilters(int populationID,
                                        java.lang.String instructor,
                                        boolean deleteCulling)
        Delete filters created for a chosen herd of a chosen population.
        Parameters:
        herdID - : Identifier of a chosen herd.
        populationID - : Identifier of the chosen population
        deleteCulling - : If true the filters for the culling herd are deleted, otherwise, they are not. This method was intended to be used to backup filters (using the culling herd) previously created which are wanted to be preserved after all animals and herds of a population are removed.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed, otherwise false.

        Update filters of selected herd of a selected population
        Parameters:
        herdID: - herd's identifier
        populationID: - identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population
        filters: - New list of filters

        Parameters:

        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • switchFilter

        public static void switchFilter(java.lang.String filteredTrait,
                                int herdID,
                                int populationID,
                                java.lang.String instructorID)
        It changes the status of a herd's attribute either from hidden to visible or from visible to hidden If selected attribute is being filtered, automatically is removed, otherwise is automatically added as a filter.
        Parameters:
        filteredTrait: - Selected herd's attribute
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • updateFilters

        public static void updateFilters(java.lang.String filteredTrait,
                                 boolean add,
                                 int herdID,
                                 int populationID,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID)
        It changes the status of a herd's attribute
        Parameters:
        filteredTrait: - Selected herd's attribute
        add: - If true, attribute 'filteredTrait' is hidden, or added as a filter. If this attribute already existed in the list of filters nothing is changed. If 'add' is false, the attribute 'filteredTrait' is made visible or removed as a filter. If the attribute is in the list of filters, is then removed, otherwise nothing is done.
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • copyFilters

        public static void copyFilters(int srcHerdID,
                               java.lang.String[] selectedHerds,
                               int populationID,
                               java.lang.String instructorID)
        Copy all filters set for a selected herd to a selected list of herds
        Parameters:
        srcHerdID: - Herd that has filters that wants to be replicated
        selectedHerds: - List of herds whose filters will be replaced by the ones set for herd 'srcHerdID'
        populationID: - Identifier of the herds' population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • updateFilters

        public static void updateFilters(java.lang.String[] filteredTraits,
                                 boolean add,
                                 int herdID,
                                 int populationID,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID)
        Update all filters of a selected herd
        Parameters:
        filteredTraits: - List of new filters that are added to the list of current ones.
        add: - If true, all attributes in list 'filteredTraits' are set as hidden. If an attribute already existed in the list of filters nothing is changed. If 'add' is false, the list of attributes in list 'filteredTraits' are made visible or removed from the filter. If the attribute is not in the list of filters nothing is done.
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • updateFilters

        public static void updateFilters(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> filteredTraits,
                                 boolean add,
                                 int herdID,
                                 int populationID,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID)
        Update all filters of a selected herd
        Parameters:
        filteredTraits: - List of new filters that are added to the list of current ones.
        add: - If true, all attributes in list 'filteredTraits' are set as hidden. If an attribute already existed in the list of filters nothing is changed. If 'add' is false, the list of attributes in list 'filteredTraits' are made visible or removed from the filter. If the attribute is not in the list of filters nothing is done.
        herdID: - Identifier of selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the population

      • updateAllFilters

        public static void updateAllFilters(int herdID,
                                    int populationID,
                                    java.lang.String instructorID,
                                    java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> newFilters)
        Update filters of a selected herd. If a previous list of filters exists, this one is updated with those new attributes included in 'newFilters' Otherwise the new list of filters is simply stored
        Parameters:
        herdID: - Identifier of the selected herd.
        populationID: - Identifier of selected herd's population
        instructorID: - Owner of the herd's population
        newFilters: - The list of new filters

      • existFilter

        public static boolean existFilter(java.lang.String filteredTrait,
                                  int herdID,
                                  int populationID,
                                  java.lang.String instructorID)
        Check if a herd's attribute was set as visible or hidden
        Parameters:
        filteredTrait: - Name of the herd's attribute
        herdID: - Identifier of the selected herd
        populationID: - Identifier of the herd's population
        instructorID: - owner of the herd's population
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is set as hidden (filtered), false if it is set as visible.

      • copyFilter

        public static boolean copyFilter(int srcHerdID,
                                 int dstHerdID,
                                 int populationID,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID)
        Copy filters of a selected herd to another herd
        Parameters:
        srcHerdID: - Herd's identifier of the herd whose filters will be copied
        dstHerdID: - Herd's identifier of the herd whose filters will be set
        populationID: - The population's identifier of both selected herds
        instructorID: - Owner of the population
        Returns:
        true if herd 'srcHerdID' has filters, otherwise false
